original_title: From Nikola Tesla to John Searl - Inventing Our Positive Future
overview: Both Nikola Tesla and John Searl envisioned a positive future for our world—a world where we work in harmony with the cosmos for our power needs instead of polluting and harming  our planet. This exciting documentary explores how our future technologies will be joining science and spirit in understanding humanity’s interdimensional nature. See a Tesla coil demonstration & a demonstration of the Searl Effect Generator (SEG) Mock Up. The SEG is a green, clean, renewable approach toward energy production.
title: From Nikola Tesla to John Searl - Inventing Our Positive Future
